description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller named HelloController. It provides several endpoints: a welcome message, a redirect to API documentation via Swagger UI, a health check, and an application info endpoint. It uses annotations for request mapping and OpenAPI documentation.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A Spring Boot REST controller that provides basic endpoints for a backend service, including welcome, documentation redirect, health check, and info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Handles GET requests at root ("/") and returns a welcome message.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Handles GET requests at "/docs" to redirect to Swagger UI, constructing the URL from the incoming request.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Handles GET requests at "/health" to return the application's health status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Handles GET requests at "/api/info" to return application information.
